name: Learn To Cook VR
description:
Welcome to Learn To Cook VR!

A final year honours project delving into the realm of VR and getting YOU to learn how to cook. The game involves looking at the posters around the room, following the hints and combining the right items on the mat so you can unlock the full recipe. 

Just make sure you complete them in time as your score will be affected if you do not!

I really hope you enjoy and any constructive feedback is really appreciate.

Have Fun Gaming!
